about_the_game:
This Squeaky Clean Pack includes 11 furniture items, 6 clothing items, 1 wig, 1 mount, and 3 pets.

Grab your soap and water, because it’s time to take a bath! The Squeaky Clean Pack has 22 bathroom-themed outfits and furniture items available for you to customize your characters and decorate your homes, sheds, and farms.

Pack includes:
  • Spotless Furniture Set: Spotless Sink, Spotless Bubble Bath, Polished Bathroom Mirror, Spotless Shower, Spotless Vanity, Spotless Toilet, Spotless Toiletbrush, Microfiber Towel, Shiny Toilet Paper Holder, Fluffy Bathroom Rug, and Linen Cabinet
  • Feeling Fresh Outfit Set: White Bathrobe, Pink Bathrobe, and Hair Roller Wig
  • Dried Off Outfit Set: Towel Wrap and Towel Turban Wrap
  • Bubble Outfit Set: Pink Bubble Cover Up and Blue Bubble Cover Up
  • Rubber Ducky Mount
  • Mister Ducky, the Rubber Duck Pet
  • Sudds, the Pink Bubble Pet
  • Scrubs, the Blue Bubble Pet
